additional_info: The 2017 UEFA Champions League Final will be the final match of the 2016â€“17 UEFA Champions League, the 62nd season of Europe's premier club football tournament organised by UEFA, and the 25th season since it was renamed from the European Champion Clubs' Cup to the UEFA Champions League. It will be played at the Millennium Stadium in Cardiff, Wales on 3 June 2017.
